mapper.select: SELECT m.member_id memberId, m.member_name memberName, l.lecture_name lectureName, group_concat(l.lecture_no ORDER BY l.lecture_no asc) lectureNo, m.member_phone memberPhone FROM instructor i LEFT JOIN member m ON m.member_id = i.member_id LEFT JOIN lecture l ON i.member_id = l.instructor_id WHERE inspectYn='Y' GROUP BY m.member_id LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}

SELECT m.member_name memberName, mi.file_name fileName, m.member_id memberId, l.lecture_name lectureName, group_concat(l.lecture_no ORDER BY l.lecture_no asc) lectureNo, m.member_gender memberGender, m.member_phone memberPhone, m.member_email memberEmail FROM member m JOIN instructor i ON m.member_id = i.member_id JOIN lecture l ON i.member_id = l.instructor_id JOIN memberImg mi ON m.member_id = mi.member_id WHERE m.member_id = #{memberId} GROUP BY m.member_id
